_sText:
NOTE: This is my very first map for CS Source and it was created for Joe.to's Halloween Map Pack of 2006. Check out the other maps of the pack too! Visit http://forums.joe.to for more info. 

PS Anyone who finds the secret on this map, either decompiled it, or used noclip :P

Map by: Dr.Boo
Name: de_hangcastle_s
Type: Bomb/Diffuse
Music: Paper Mario TTYD: Doopliss battle & Super Mario 64: King Boo's merry-go-round
Special Thanks:

-The Joe.to forums
-Nintendo
-The Kingpin and the Bagelshack servers 
-the NIPPER Source maps server

The focus of this map was to create a spooky good looking map, and to experiment with the features of Source's  map editor. Gameplay may not be this map's strongest point.
